name: sprint5-with-bugs
description: Sprint5-with-bugs is used to demonstrate how Exploratory Testing  works. We introduced 40+ bugs (defects) which can be found by using different testing tours.

scripts.cy:run:report: cypress run --browser chrome && npm run generate:report
scripts.generate:report: mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json > cypress/reports/merged-report.json && marge cypress/reports/merged-report.json --reportDir cypress/reports --inline
scripts.test:full: cypress run --browser chrome && npm run generate:custom
